name: The Learning Tree
description:
Following a tribunal, you have been offered a chance at Reeducation at the Learning Tree - the country's #1 education center.

Just answer these simple questions to establish your eligibility.

It is in everyone's best interest that you reintegrate into society.

Estimated playtime: 6 minutes

Text and Twine - Petter Vilberg
Music - Thomas Skuggevik
